name: Krome Technologies
description: Krome provide technologies, services and solutions that work for you now and evolve with your business in the future. From infrastructure design, technical system support, project management to full lifecycle fulfilment services, Krome offer complete technology solutions. Krome offer a range of services and solutions, working with you as a valued supplier, consultancy and solutions provider. Krome consultants have a wealth of experience in solution design and deployment.
